summary: Test suite that validates the ModelAdmin.formfield_for_dbfield method generates appropriate form fields for a wide range of model field types and configurations, including custom overrides, choice handling, radio and raw ID widgets, many‑to‑many relationships, and inheritance behavior.
business_intent: Guarantee that the Django admin interface correctly maps database fields to form fields, respecting custom widget overrides and special options, thereby preventing UI regressions and ensuring consistent admin functionality.
